LanguageData.VRE_FelineEars.label: котячі вуха
LanguageData.VRE_FelineEars.description: Carriers of this gene will have soft, furry, feline ears.
LanguageData.VRE_FelineTail.label: котячий хвіст
LanguageData.VRE_FelineTail.description: Carriers of this gene grow a furry tail that does not have any purpose other than decorative.
LanguageData.VRE_PerfectBody.label: досконале тіло
LanguageData.VRE_PerfectBody.description: Carriers of this gene have perfect bodies with no flaws what-so-ever. Their bodies are symmetrical, with soft skin that feels like silk to the touch. People who get intimate with carriers of this gene will not be satisfied when lovin’ anyone without perfect body.
LanguageData.VRE_HighmateHair.label: досконале волосся
LanguageData.VRE_HighmateHair.description: Carriers of this gene are guaranteed to use specific Highmate hair styles.
